Name: White Marble Statue of the Goddess Isis
Description: The marvelous life-sized statue of the goddess Isis is sculpted in white marble. It shows Isis standing on a base, wearing a long gown with a cloak on top and a sash tied on her chest. Her hair is arranged in the Libyan style. She wears on her head the crown of Hathor, a combination of the sun disk, two cow horns, and two feathers. Her left foot is placed on a crocodile. She carries in one hand her favorite vessel for the sacred water of the Nile. A snake is shown curled around the other hand, which was found separated from the statue.
